tool_description: Formats chunked text output according to specified format requirements and adds final metadata and indexing.

chunks.description: Array of text chunks to format

output_format.description: Desired output format: json, csv, txt, or xml

include_metadata.description: Whether to include chunk metadata in output

include_indices.description: Whether to include chunk indices in output

error_messages: Empty chunks array: Provide at least one chunk for formatting.
Invalid output format: Format must be one of [json, csv, txt, xml].
Formatting failed: Unable to format chunks in the specified output format.
Compression failed: Unable to compress the formatted output.
usage: Provide chunks array and output_format, optionally configure metadata inclusion and compression. Returns formatted chunk output.

formatted_output.description: The formatted chunk output as a string

output_size.description: Size of the formatted output in bytes

chunk_count.description: Number of chunks in the formatted output

format_version.description: Version of the output format used
